Posts.Content: Jan 4, 2012 12:42PM tfriend4ever wrote: Well my mom has done a complete turn around! She started on Arimidex in the end of November and within 2-3 weeks she was back on feet, feeling good, eating and putting on weight. It is amazing how close to death she was and then to turn around so amazingly. We are truly blessed! She is down to get 1-1.5 letres drained per week and is actually driving around and going shopping. Keeping our fingers crossed that she continues as she is :) Thank you all for your kind words and advice.
Posts.Title: Ascites tfriend4ever suz45

Posts.Content: Nov 10, 2011 12:04AM tfriend4ever wrote: Thank you for your kind words...I'm keeping my fingers crossed that the treatment will turn everything around. Alesta29, yes the fluid and weight loss is what made her go to the doctors, there weren't any other signs of illness at all. All of the tests so far are only showing 3 mets, one on her spine and two on her hips. They said all other organs looked okay...
